attributes.name: Event
attributes.description:
An event is a meeting of a group. It has a start and end time, and can be
either physical or virtual.

attributes.name: attendance_requests_enabled
attributes.description:
This is a group setting that applies to all the events in the group.
If selected, an email will be sent to the primary email address of the group leader
60 minutes before the event start time, asking them to report attendance.

attributes.name: automated_reminder_enabled
attributes.description:
If `true`, we send an event remind some specified time before the event starts
to all members in the group.

attributes.name: canceled
attributes.description: Whether or not the event has been canceled.

attributes.name: canceled_at
attributes.description: The date and time the event was canceled.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: A longform description of the event. Can contain HTML markup.

attributes.name: ends_at
attributes.description: The date and time the event ends.

attributes.name: location_type_preference
attributes.description: Either "physical" or "virtual".

attributes.name: multi_day
attributes.description: `true` if the event spans multiple days. Otherwise `false`.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name/title of the event.

attributes.name: reminders_sent
attributes.description: `true` if reminders have been sent for this event. Otherwise `false`.

attributes.name: reminders_sent_at
attributes.description: The date and time reminders were sent for this event.

attributes.name: repeating
attributes.description: `true` if the event is a repeating event. Otherwise `false`.

attributes.name: starts_at
attributes.description: The date and time the event starts.

attributes.name: virtual_location_url
attributes.description:
The URL for the virtual location. Typically we don't show this URL unless
unless the location_type_preference is "virtual".

attributes.name: visitors_count
attributes.description:
The number of visitors who attended the event. These are people who are not
members of the group.

attributes.name: group
attributes.details: group which the event belongs to

scopes.name: not_canceled
scopes.scope_help: do not have a `canceled_at` date and time

attributes.name: events
attributes.details: events of groups with this group type

scopes.name: not_canceled
scopes.scope_help: do not have a `canceled_at` date and time

attributes.name: events
attributes.details: events for all groups in this organization

scopes.name: group
scopes.scope_help:
from specific groups; provide an additional `group_id` param
as a comma-separated list of IDs, ex: `?filter=group&group_id=1,2,3`

scopes.name: group_type
scopes.scope_help:
from specific group types; provide an additional `group_type_id` param
as a comma-separated list of IDs, ex: `?filter=group_type&group_type_id=1,2,3`

scopes.name: my_groups
scopes.scope_help: only group events of which you are a member

scopes.name: not_canceled
scopes.scope_help: does not have a `canceled_at` date and time

attributes.name: events
attributes.details: events of groups which this person is a member

scopes.name: not_canceled
scopes.scope_help: does not have a `canceled_at` date and time

attributes.name: group
attributes.description: include associated group

attributes.name: location
attributes.description: include associated location

attributes.name: ends_at
attributes.description: prefix with a hyphen (-ends_at) to reverse the order

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: prefix with a hyphen (-name) to reverse the order

attributes.name: starts_at
attributes.description: prefix with a hyphen (-starts_at) to reverse the order

attributes.name: ends_at
attributes.description: Query on a specific ends_at

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Query on a specific name

attributes.name: starts_at
attributes.description: Query on a specific starts_at

attributes.name: per_page
attributes.description: how many records to return per page (min=1, max=100, default=25)

attributes.name: offset
attributes.description: get results from given offset
